termsFullText:
Terms of Service

1. Purpose
These terms govern the use of StanBeat (the "Service"), including conditions, procedures, and the rights and obligations of users and operators.

2. Prize Policy
1) Prizes are awarded to top rankers after each season ends.
2) Prizes may be substituted with equivalent items or rolled over if participation is below 5,000.
3) Flight ticket issuance may take up to 180 days after winner announcement.
4) Taxes are the winner's responsibility.
5) Shipping delays may occur.

3. Heart System
1) One heart is consumed per game play.
2) Maximum 3 hearts can be stored.
3) Hearts expire 3 hours after acquisition.
4) One free heart is given daily at UTC 00:00.

4. Prohibited Actions
Records obtained through automation, macros, or abnormal access will be invalidated and accounts may be permanently suspended.

5. Disclaimer
The service is provided as-is; operators may suspend or modify the service without prior notice.
